Data

class Data

Common data helper stuff.

Properties

static protected array $cache Let's cache already loaded files (locale-specific).
static protected array $cacheGeneric Let's cache already loaded files (not locale-specific).
static protected array $overrides Custom overrides of CLDR data (locale-specific).
static protected array $overridesGeneric Custom overrides of CLDR data (not locale-specific).
static protected string $defaultLocale The current default locale.
static protected string $fallbackLocale The fallback locale (used if default locale is not found).
static protected string $directory The data root directory.

at line 147
static array getOverrides(null|mixed $locale = null)

Get custom overrides of CLDR locale data.

If a locale is specified, overrides for that locale are returned, indexed by identifier. If no locale is specified, overrides for all locales are returned index by locale.

Parameters

null|mixed $locale

Return Value

array Associative array

at line 166
static setOverrides(array $overrides, string $locale = null)

Set custom overrides of CLDR locale data.

Overrides may be provides either one locale at a time or all locales at once.

Parameters

array $overrides Associative array index by locale (if $locale is null) or identifier
string $locale

at line 325
static array getAvailableLocales(bool $allowGroups = false)

Return a list of available locale identifiers.

Parameters

bool $allowGroups Set to true if you want to retrieve locale groups (eg. 'en-001'), false otherwise

Return Value

array

at line 368
static string guessFullLocale(string $language = '', string $script = '')

Try to guess the full locale (with script and territory) ID associated to a language.

Parameters

string $language The language identifier (if empty we'll use the current default language)
string $script The script identifier (if $language is empty we'll use the current default script)

Return Value

string Returns an empty string if the territory was not found, the territory ID otherwise

at line 406
static string getTerritory(string $locale = '', bool $checkFallbackLocale = true)

Return the terrotory associated to the locale (guess it if it's not present in $locale).

Parameters

string $locale The locale identifier (if empty we'll use the current default locale)
bool $checkFallbackLocale Set to true to check the fallback locale if $locale (or the default locale) don't have an associated territory, false to don't fallback to fallback locale

Return Value

string

at line 440
static null|mixed getTerritoryNode(array $data, string $locale = '')

Return the node associated to the locale territory.

Parameters

array $data The parent array for which you want the territory node
string $locale The locale identifier (if empty we'll use the current default locale)

Return Value

null|mixed Returns null if the node was not found, the node data otherwise

at line 465
static null|mixed getLanguageNode(array $data, string $locale = '')

Return the node associated to the language (not locale) territory.

Parameters

array $data The parent array for which you want the language node
string $locale The locale identifier (if empty we'll use the current default locale)

Return Value

null|mixed Returns null if the node was not found, the node data otherwise

at line 491
static null|mixed getLocaleItem(array $data, string $locale = '')

Returns the item of an array associated to a locale.

Parameters

array $data The data containing the locale info
string $locale The locale identifier (if empty we'll use the current default locale)

Return Value

null|mixed Returns null if $data is not an array or it does not contain locale info, the array item otherwise

at line 518
static null|string[] explodeLocale(string $locale)

Parse a string representing a locale and extract its components.

Parameters

string $locale

Return Value

null|string[] Return null if $locale is not valid; if $locale is valid returns an array with keys 'language', 'script', 'territory', 'parentLocale'

static protected string getLocaleFolder(string $locale)

Returns the path of the locale-specific data, looking also for the fallback locale.

Parameters

string $locale The locale for which you want the data folder

Return Value

string Returns an empty string if the folder is not found, the absolute path to the folder otherwise

at line 637
static protected array getLocaleAlternatives(string $locale, bool $addFallback = true)

Returns a list of locale identifiers associated to a locale.

Parameters

string $locale The locale for which you want the alternatives
bool $addFallback Set to true to add the fallback locale to the result, false otherwise

Return Value

array
